Row.Text: Expansion is available in {1_CityName}! Should this Population remain here and expand to a new tile, or become a Migrant and move elsewhere?
No suitable location to spawn this Unit.
You cannot raze a settlement that you have founded.
This Settlement cannot expand right now.
{1_Name} will be gradually destroyed over a period of {2_NumTurns} Turns. During this time the settlement will not generate any yields.[n]{3_conquest_penalty}.[n]{4_razing_penalty}.
You receive no penalty for keeping this Settlement
